item.title: Note-taking system using Obsidian and the PARA method
item.description: In this blog post I explain the PARA method and how you should take notes using Obsidian

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a Computer Science student at UFCG and a DevOps Engineer at Distributed System Laboratory (or LSD, in Portuguese), located in my university.

I’m passionate about Linux, Virtualization, Automation and the whole IT field. In fact, what brought me to where I’m working was the passion I have for Linux and everything that surrounds it, like living in the terminal.

Check out my dotfiles repo

I also love Math and the Human field (History, Philosophy, Sociology, etc).
